itinerary.mapNote: Drive from Kathmandu, short trek to first village. 890m.
Restricted Area checkpoint. Budhi Gandaki gorge. 1340m.

itinerary.highlights: Entry to restricted area; bamboo forests
itinerary.mapNote: Subtropical forest gives way to pine. 1804m.

itinerary.highlights: Stunning views of Manaslu’s twin peaks
itinerary.mapNote: First clear Manaslu 8163m views from monastery. 3180m.
Large Tibetan village. Pungyen Gompa day hike option. 3530m.

itinerary.highlights: Side trip to Birendra Lake or Manaslu BC
itinerary.mapNote: Acclimatisation day. Manaslu Base Camp hike. 3530m.

itinerary.highlights: Yak pastures & proximity to Tibetan border
itinerary.mapNote: Near Tibetan border. Highest village on route. 3875m.
Acclimatisation day. Nyi La 4950m day hike. 3875m.
Larkya La Base Camp. Early sleep before pass day. 4460m.

itinerary.highlights: Larkya La Pass; steep glacier descent
itinerary.mapNote: After Larkya La 5160m — circuit highpoint. Long descent. 3630m.

itinerary.highlights: Exit via the Marsyangdi River valley

itinerary.mapNote: Drive back to Kathmandu. Trek complete. 1400m.

waypoints.name: Manaslu Summit
waypoints.note: 8th highest peak. 'Mountain of the Spirit'. Dominates the circuit.

waypoints.name: Larkya La Pass
waypoints.note: Circuit highpoint. Often snow-covered. Sunrise crossing essential.

waypoints.name: Manaslu Base Camp
waypoints.note: Day hike from Samagaon. North face. Expedition tents in season.

waypoints.name: Nyi La Pass (acclimatisation)
waypoints.note: Acclimatisation hike from Samdo. Tibet border views.

waypoints.name: Pungyen Gompa
waypoints.note: Ancient monastery above Samagaon. Manaslu's most sacred site.

waypoints.name: Budhi Gandaki Gorge
waypoints.note: Some of the deepest gorge sections in Nepal. Early trekking days.
